data.text: @PhilippineStar @onenewsph Bale? Paano mangyayari sa mga yan? Anong gagawin?
@PhilippineStar @onenewsph #Elections2022 lang pala makakapag pa wala ng Covid-19 dito sa pinas
@PhilippineStar @onenewsph 😱 May on going projects pa yung iba. 🙈😁 Well convert nalang muna for other use. 😊

@PhilippineStar @onenewsph How long have they been on “warm” standby?  If they are already gone “cold” then announce this because it would be good to know when evaluating how much risk we individually take in public.
@PhilippineStar @onenewsph The sad part about this was nobody asked whenever covid would one day go away, what would happen to the empty quarantine facilities
